name: Avatar Skin - Skinnable GUI Toolkit
short_description: Based on wxWidgets, this library is intended to be a cross platform toolkit for creating skinnable user interfaces. Among other features: gdi managers to eficiently manage resources, xml skin file definition, lua scripting, etc
